ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark - Evil Outpost Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a wood elf bard who worships Bristlebane.  With DE illusion up and Carrilion, I can get my faction to amiable in the evil outpost, allowing me to bank and
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a wood elf bard who worships Bristlebane. With DE illusion up and
Carrilion, I can get my faction to amiable in the evil outpost, allowing me
to bank and trade there. However, I still died there over the weekend. I
was turning in 4 sarnak war braids to the undead captain when I went
linkdead. I knew I would be in trouble when I logged back in (why do
illusions disappear when you go LD but standard buffs remain in effect?).
As soon as I logged in, I started heading for the countryside. I got Selos
up but realized I forgot to toggle Run. So next thing I know the General
and his dragoon goons were whipping up on me. I might have lasted a total
of 10 seconds from the time I logged in to the time I died. Fortunatly I
got far enough away that I could get to my corpse with the invis song up and
not have to worry about getting close to the dragoons. So lesson learned is
don't bank/trade in evil outpost if your connection is suspect.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: Monday, October 23, 2000 4:48 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Kunark - Evil Outpost Faction



I just got my Mask of Deception (yeah yeah I know..I should have had this
thing 15 levels ago) and the evil Dragoons in The Overthere still are
scowling ready to attack when I am a Delf.

I am a half-elf Bard, Quellious is my Diety. Is there any way to use the
Charismatic Carrilion (sp?) to up faction enough to turn in the braids for
faction increases?

Lago Bardoon of Bertoxx, 45th Composition, Defenders of Aleria


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
